content: How much do I owe in taxes?

Tax rate,Taxable income threshold
2.46%, on the portion of taxable income that is $8040 or less, plus
3.51%, on the portion of taxable income over $8040 up to $48250 plus
5.01%, on the portion of taxable income over $48250 up to $77730 plus
5.20%, on the portion of taxable income over $77730
